passages.passage_text: to perform demos for interested customers. The installation process for customers is different due to the database setup that involves the company installing the software.

•

Vendors would still be created at account group level.

•

The process would be covered in subsequent slides with a process flow and Newgen demo.

•

LASP, Interco and employee related vendors will follow a different process as this is dependent on other process streams.

text1: Demo 2: Periodic COPA Revaluation with Actual Material Cost Components   Step 1: Execute t-code KE27   Keep all entries (except Period) the same as the above screen.

CO – Annual Standard Price Updation Demo Setup Organization Value Plant 1012 Demo 3: Release Standard Price for all Materials Valuation Type 3660 Master Data Value Material Master (SKU) 120732 This demonstration explains the following steps: 1 Upload the excel file with the Plan Activity Prices for all relevant Activity Type - Cost Center combinations in the specified upload template.

Demo 1: New Steps in ML Run   Step 1: Execute ML Run (CKMLCP)   The following changes apply to this transaction:   ML Run will now be done for all linked MUs, TMUs, Depots in a single run in order to enable proper transfer of variances across plants.

CO – Period Closing and COPA   Demo Setup   Organization Value TMU 3635 Master Data Value Material Master (SKU) 103028 This demonstration explains the following:   1 New Steps in ML Run CKMLCP CO 2 Periodic COPA Revaluation with Actual Material Cost Components KE27 CO .

Demo 2: Upload Future Price & Date   Step 1: Prepare the MM02 LSMW file and upload using LSMW   The following screenshots show the path from MM02 transaction for a specific material:   Ensure that “Future price” and “Future price from” fields are correctly updated with the future std price.

text1: This installation process should be used for all representatives that are selling Avercast Software and are in need of the program in order to perform demos for interested customers.
